name: Bold 'n' Saucy Cheeseburger
author: Anonymous
summary: Are you bold? Try this full-flavored hamburger made with A.1. Bold & Spicy Steak Sauce, red onion, tomato, and Kraft Singles on a whole wheat bun.
ingredients: ¼ cup A.1. Bold & Spicy Steak Sauce, divided
4 roll (blank)s whole wheat hamburger buns, split
directions: Mix meat and 2 tablespoons of the steak sauce in medium bowl
Spray both sides of onion slices with cooking spray and set aside
Grill patties 4 minutes on each side or until cooked through, adding onions to the grill after 2 minutes and cooking until crisp-tender
Top the burgers with the 2% Milk Singles and continue grilling until the 2% Milk Singles are melted
Place burgers on bottom halves of buns
Top evenly with remaining 2 tablespoons steak sauce
Cover with onions, tomatoes and top halves of buns
